description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Nyamasheke, Rwanda. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Five-Star Rwanda One&Only Wilderness Retreat within Chimpanzee-Inhabited Nyungwe National Park
hotels.description: Experience a wilderness retreat unlike any other at One&Only Nyungwe House, a five-star property dripping in jungle-flavoured luxury on the fringes of Rwanda's Nyungwe National Park. Be immersed in the serene beauty of Africa's oldest forest, surrounded by mountain landscapes and amidst a working tea plantation. During your stay, dine on a sustainable, farm-to-table menu at the onsite restaurant. Sit out on the open deck at the Tea Lounge & Bar to enjoy tea-infused cocktails and light snacks while watching the swaying canopy of the forest - if you're lucky, you might catch a glimpse of a chimpanzee or monkey swinging from the treetops. For a dose of R&R, the One&Only Spa offers unbeatable spa treatments including a signature full-body Intoga Amasatchi massage to leave you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

seo.title: Hotel a Nyamasheke - Rwanda Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Nyamasheke, Rwanda con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
